name: Attentive security – Hide Wp Version, Redirect Wp-Admin link
author: ThemeAtelier

sections.description: Attentive Security Plugin is a very simple WordPress security plugin. With this plugin you can hide your current WordPress version from any resource, You can redirect your wp-admin link to any page. So if anyone tries to access the wp-admin link they won’t be able to do that.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Attentive – WordPress security plugin’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Settings => Attentive WSP Settings => and follow the options how you need.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release.

1.3.0

  • Change codebase to compitible with PHP 8.1
